name: iso-test
description: Isomorphic test framework for browser & node libs and apps.

scripts.test:
timeout 1 ./server.node.js ./pass.js && f=$(timeout 1 ./server.node.js ./fail.js 2>&1); if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then printf '(node) ./fail.js
pass	fail.js failed as expected

(browser) ./fail.js
pass	fail.js failed as expected

'; else printf 'fail	failed to fail fail.js
'; exit 1; fi && f=$(timeout 1 ./server.node.js ./error.js 2>&1); if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then printf '(node) ./error.js
pass	error.js failed as expected

(browser) ./error.js
pass	error.js failed as expected

'; else printf 'fail	failed to fail error.js
'; exit 1; fi && echo 'All tests passed!'

author: isysd
